ComicInfo.Summary: The Evil Within: When Voodoo botches a mission, Zealot is harsh enough with her that she decides she is useless and leaves the team. Overcome with despair, she quickly falls into a Daemonite trap and is possessed. When the WildC.A.T.S are called on to protect the president from Daemonites, they find they cannot locate them in the crowd without Voodoo's help. The President falls to the Daemonites and begins to do Helspont's bidding. Maul tracks down Voodoo and helps her shake off the Daemonite parasite. She then is able to help the WildC.A.T.S save the president.
ComicInfo.Title: The Evil Within
